visionMission.title: Vision & Mission
visionMission.visionText: To become a leading company in providing the best solutions for customers.
visionMission.mission3: Making a positive contribution to society.

companyProfile.title: Company Profile
companyProfile.description: We are a company dedicated to providing the best services to our customers. With years of experience, we continue to grow and innovate to deliver the best solutions tailored to our customers' needs.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a company dedicated to providing the best services to customers with innovation and excellence.

hero.title: Welcome to Our Company
hero.description: We provide the best solutions for your business needs with innovation and dedication.

footer.about_description: Seroja Medan Group is a leading company in construction and design, committed to providing the best solutions for our clients.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: We are looking for talented individuals who are ready to grow with us. Find a position that matches your skills and interests.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: We are ready to help! Feel free to contact us.

items.question: How can I contact customer service?
items.answer: You can contact us via WhatsApp or email.

items.question: How long does it take for a response from our team?
items.answer: We usually respond within 24 hours on business days.

items.question: Is consultation service available?
items.answer: Yes, we provide consultation services. Please contact us for more information.

cta.title: Join Us
cta.description: Make your dream project a reality with our best services.
